      • getSmsResponse

        public SmsResponse getSmsResponse(java.lang.String rawBody)
        Parses a raw body sent by the system to the configured notifyURL (in the Globe Labs developer site) into an SMS response.
        Parameters:
        rawBody - The content sent by the system to the notifyURL of content type "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" and charset UTF-8.
        Parameters must consist of the following:
        command_length, command_id, command_status, sequence_number, command, service_type, source_addr_ton, source_addr_npi, source_addr, dest_addr_ton, dest_addr_npi, destination_addr, esm_class, protocol_id, priority_flag, schedule_delivery_time, validity_period, registered_delivery, replace_if_present_flag, data_coding, sm_default_msg_id, short_message[message], source_network_type, dest_network_type, message_payload[message].
        Returns:
        SMS Response object which includes the message, sourceAddr (where the message came from), and destAddr (to which number the message was sent) among other fields parsed from the rawBody.
